title: 3 and Out - Brees All-Time Rank; Seattle/GB #1 Seed Battle; Bad Ownership; Eagles/Cowboys Showdown; AFC Playoff Picture; Weekend Thoughts
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Brees All-Time Rank; Seattle/GB #1 Seed Battle; Bad Ownership; Eagles/Cowboys Showdown; AFC Playoff Picture; Weekend Thoughts
description:
In this episode, Middlekauff discusses the prolonged excellence of Dew Brees, where he would rank all-time with another Super Bowl, why he doesn't buy that the Seahawks and Packers are the top teams in the NFC despite currently being the top two seeds, the insurmountable curse of bad ownership, and the upcoming massive Eagles/Cowboys NFC East matchup. He also gives his takeaways from Week 15 and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
